--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> BIC:
> 
> nWo scan- finds Maximal Base, Predacon Base, but due to atmospheric 
> disturbances a heavy and violent electrical storm was detected 
around 
> a large region which encompassed the Rogue Base and also the Tripred 
> base, and both were missed while scanning.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > (I was talking about a general rule of cloaking devices.)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: It's not "super godly" technology - it's just not 
> cybertronian. 
> >  
> > > A scan has to be specifically modulated to pierce cloaking 
shields 
> > to 
> > > break through.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > > > OOC:  Cardhead, in case you don't remember, Sting, Razor and 
> > Diesel 
> > > were in space.  They got to Earth on a highly advanced ship, and 
> > Sting 
> > > ran a scan of the whole Earth, and the scan got EVERYTHING.  
> There, 
> > if
